price: 34. Nous allons faire fondre du ciel un châtiment sur les habitants de cette cité, pour leur dépravation.
arabic: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā munzilūna ʿalā ahli hādhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
